Hi, everyone, I have a problem about neat.
I applied NEAT to the mountain c=
ar problem, and I found the result is bad. I want to find out why.
Here are=
 some possilbility I am thinking of. Can anyone give me any hints and comme=
nts.
The first possibility I thought is the weak ability of the initial pop=
ulation, since there are no hidden nodes, the neural network can not approx=
imate the value function well. In my experiment, it can not achieve the top=
 after 10000 steps. 
Another reason I considered is the initial weights of =
the neural network, learning rate and so on, these parameters should be set=
 carefully, but it takes me a long time, and I haven't found a better setti=
ng.
I also think the mutation rate is an important factor.If I set a small =
mutation rate, it may take a longer time to envolve. If I set a bigger valu=
e, does this lead to divergence?

Any feedback is appreciated.
